name: web.get_page_content
description: Extract the readable content from the given page URL in the Markdown format.

url.description:
A string starting with 'http://' or 'https://' or '@' and a short uid
to get the URL from the last `search_topk` call (e.g. '@4x34b')

returns: A markdown string with the page content

name: web.search_topk
description: Get top K search results for the given query (just like a desktop browser with a search engine).

query.description: The search query in a natural form

k.description: The amount of top relevant pages to return (default: 5)

returns:
A list of K dictionaries with URLs, their descriptions and short unique IDs
for referencing in answers or other functions

name: web.search_wiki
description: Get top K search results from Wikipedia for the given query.

query.description: The search query in a natural form

k.description: The amount of top relevant extracts to return (default: 5)

returns: A list of K dictionaries with URLs and short Wikipedia extracts as well as some metadata.
